channel.title: staff on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers
channel.description: Recent content in staff on ShadowNode Modded Game Servers

item.title: Staff
item.description: NoteMembers with (A) behind there name are in Away mode. They may or may not be able to assist. For quick help, #support or a #tickets is still the best way to get support. Provided you have joined ShadowNode Discord. You will need to be in the ShadowNode Discord to message staff or create a ticket.
